title: Vet Prep & Cat Supervision (Optional)
summary: Build cooperative care skills and begin calm, gated cat sessions if applicable.

lessons.title: Vet Prep — Cooperative Care
lessons.objective: Comfort with exam positions and brief restraint.
steps: Touch ear → treat; lift lip → treat; hold collar → treat.
Briefly simulate thermometer lift tail → treat.
End with calm cuddle and snack.
supportGuidelines: Break steps down; treat after each tiny action.
Practice on elevated surface only if safe.
lessons.safetyNotes: Stop if distress; never force procedures.

lessons.title: Cat Sessions 1 (Optional) — Gated Visual
lessons.objective: Calm observation of the cat through a barrier.
steps: Puppy on leash observes cat through gate.
Mark and reward looking then turning back to you.
supportGuidelines: If fixation: increase distance, reward for disengagement.
lessons.safetyNotes: Never allow chasing; prioritize cat welfare.

lessons.title: Muzzle/Chin Target (Care Aid)
lessons.objective: Teach a cooperative 'chin on hand' for stillness.
steps: Hand under chin; when puppy rests chin, mark and treat.
Use during brief brushing or vet prep.
supportGuidelines: If restless: reduce duration, increase reward frequency.
